The Quranic researcher in a satisfied life said, Abu Ubaidah and the Farah said that any satisfaction, and one is one of the one who is satisfied with the matter that it is a matter of the form of the form of the same, and the same Edabbed with satisfaction, and it is also a satisfactory sense, and it is mentioned that what the proportions want it is not feminine as it was stated in it, and it is the pleasure of it, and it is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is pleased with him Tawil, except that the vitality is said in it for the exaggeration and in which there is research.And some of the investigators said that their intention is that what the proportions were intended for, and its obedience is required, and if it comes to the disagreement of the origin, the predominance of the one who is sometimes the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is sometimes A metaphor in the chain of transmission and the origin in a satisfied life that accompanied it, so it is satisfied with it to make it always for the sacrifice as if it was satisfied.It is permissible for a place to be a normal and seductive boss, as it was separated in the long time of suffering.
